attributes.title: Reacting to True Crime Fan Theories
attributes.caption: Trevor and Alfredo read and react to theories sent by listeners about past mysteries covered on Red Web Podcast. The theories cover Markovian Parallax Denigrate, Grave Robbing for Morons, Sleep As Android Incident, and Mary Celeste.
attributes.description:
Trevor and Alfredo read and react to theories sent by listeners about past mysteries covered on Red Web Podcast. The theories cover Markovian Parallax Denigrate, Grave Robbing for Morons, Sleep As Android Incident, and Mary Celeste. 

If you'd like Red Web to read your theories, email redweb@roosterteeth.com with permission. Please include your initials and pronouns.
attributes.display_title: Reacting to True Crime Fan Theories
